plugin.name: FT2_portal
plugin.author: Khrysis
plugin.purpose: To help rerun the goal from Red Riding Hood
plugin.description:
-----To Get Ready to start---------> ft2 guide on/off = turns the guide window on or off ft2 on/off = turns on the room links and aliases needed to run the goal When you are done running the goal or rerunning it turn these off to disable the plugin until next use. ft2goal = Alias that goes to the starting area or you can click on the Task 9 in the ft2 guide window
-----Mapper Goto locations---------> mapper goto 1258 = buy chocolate (1 per run) mapper goto 32598 = buy dirk (1 per run) mapper goto 30531 = buy heart (only need one because keeps giving it back) mapper goto 49335 = buy hat (1 per run) mapper goto 1246 = kill silver for wish (1 per run) mapper goto 30823 = kill musician for lute or cast 'major creation lute 2.lute 3.lute mapper goto 23751 = to get rutabaga for sex change (buy 4) (usually get a lot of them because going female or male isnt guarantee)
-----Show this help file-----------> ft2 help = to see this help file
-----Update Aliases---------------> ft2 update check = check for updates ft2 update install = installs updates

trigger.match: You receive an evil curse from an evil faerie.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Move on to next room... ") Hyperlink ("run se", "Click Here", "runs se", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("remove wielded") Send ("wear curse")

trigger.match: You get a thumb from the * corpse of a midwife.
trigger.send: wear thumb

trigger.match: You receive a royal ring from the princess.
trigger.send: wear ring

trigger.match: You receive a peacock fan from a swan.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the peacock fan. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w", "Click Here", "runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a magical basket from One-Eye.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the magical basket. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run s", "Click Here", "runs south", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a bridle from a pimp.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the bridle. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w", "Click Here", "runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get a magic bean from the * corpse of a magic bean.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the magic bean. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("say exit", "Click Here", "says exit", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: Who are the Kaschei's cook's favorite performers?
trigger.send: say Little Billy and the Bootleg Bowlers

trigger.match: You receive a carrot from the mother rabbit.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the carrot. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 2ses", "Click Here", "runs 2ses", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive Prince Charming's eyes from a hedge of thorns.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the eyes to move on... ") Hyperlink ("run sw", "Click Here", "runs sw", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get a box of matches from the * corpse of the matchgirl.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You got a box of matches. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 2n", "Click Here", "runs 2n", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("remove wielded") Send ("wear matches")

trigger.match: You receive a thumb from the miller's wife.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the thumb to move on... ") Hyperlink ("run s", "Click Here", "runs s", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a pork chop from a brick seller.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the pork chop. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a mermaid's tongue from an old hag.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the mermaid's tongue. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 3sen", "Click Here", "runs 3sen", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a ruby necklace from the princess.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the necklace. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 2e", "Click Here", "runs 2 east", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("wear crown")

trigger.match: You receive a magical tablecloth from Three-Eye.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the magical tablecloth. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run e", "Click Here", "runs east", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a bundle of flax from a horse.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the bundle of flax. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run e", "Click Here", "runs east", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get a one-sleeved tunic from the * corpse of the princess.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the tunic. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 4n", "Click Here", "runs 4 north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You deftly steal a thumb from a midwife.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the thumb. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w2n", "Click Here", "runs w2n", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("wear thumb")

trigger.match: You receive a red riding hood from Little Red Riding Hood.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourNote ("white","","You have the hood!") ColourNote ("yellow","","You can move on to the next part.") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Wear the hood and move on ") Hyperlink ("wear hood;run wswn", "Click Here", "wear the hood and run to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a pair of wolf eyes from Grandmother.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Wear the two items and move on... ") Hyperlink ("wear nose;wear wolf;run es", "Click Here", "wear the two items and move to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a golden crown from Prince Thrushbeard.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the crown. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 2e", "Click Here", "runs 2 east", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("wear crown")

trigger.match: You receive a bowl of pork stew from the big bad wolf.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the pork stew. ","yellow","","Task 16 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 17... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26807", "Click Here", "goes to room 26807", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get a thorn from the * corpse of an evil faerie.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the thorn now to envenom it... ") Hyperlink ("envenom thorn", "Click Here", "envenoms the thorn", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get a ham hock from the * corpse of the first little pig.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the ham hock... ") Hyperlink ("run s", "Click Here", "runs south", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a wishing star from an old hag.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the wishing star. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 3se", "Click Here", "runs 3se", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a pork chop from the second little pig.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the pork chop. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w", "Click Here", "runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a night pass from the evil mother.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the night pass. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run 2s", "Click Here", "runs 2s", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a golden apple from Prince Charming.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 14 ","white","","complete. To move on to ","yellow","","Task 15","white","","... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26793;keep apple", "Click Here", "goes to room 26793", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a basket of treats from Mrs. Riding Hood.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You got the basket to wear the hood and move to next part... ") Hyperlink ("wear hood;run se", "Click Here", "wears the hood and runs se to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a pile of beans from a bean salesman.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Type beans for alias after you get a pile of beans or ") Hyperlink ("beans", "Click Here", "Uses beans alias to go to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You get wolf teeth from the hacked corpse of a wolf.
trigger.send: Send ("keep teeth") Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 9 complete","white","","... To move to the next task ") Hyperlink ("charm", "Click Here", "Moves to the next task", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: You receive a gold charm from the troll under the bridge.
trigger.send: Send ("keep charm")

trigger.match: You receive a golden egg from Jack.
trigger.send: Send ("keep egg")

trigger.match: You get a suit of nothing.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move to the next room... ") Hyperlink ("run 2e", "Click Here", "runs 2e", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("wear suit") Send ("wear cloak")

trigger.match: You get a goat's heart from the * corpse of a magical goat.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourNote ("white","","You got the heart!") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move to the next room... ") Hyperlink ("run 2n", "Click Here", "runs 2n", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: The second little pig drops a map to the stick house.
trigger.send: get map

trigger.match: Susie Rabbit drops Susie's heart.
trigger.send: get heart

trigger.match: Prince Charming drops lip balm.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To Move on to next room... ") Hyperlink ("run enw", "Click Here", "runs enw", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("get balm")

trigger.match: A wood seller drops a bundle of sticks.
trigger.send: Send ("get sticks") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the sticks. To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run s", "Click Here", "runs south", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A wolf drops a pair of leather boots.
trigger.send: Send ("get boots") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move on to next part... ") Hyperlink ("wear boots;wear hood;run n", "Click Here", "wears eq and moves to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A straw seller drops a bundle of straw.
trigger.send: Send ("get straw") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w", "Click Here", "runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A phoenix drops a phoenix feather.
trigger.send: get feather

trigger.match: A midwife drops a birth certificate.
trigger.send: Send ("get certificate") Send ("wear certificate") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","After getting certificate to move on... ") Hyperlink ("run w2n", "Click Here", "runs w2n", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A bean salesman asks, "That's a mighty fine cow, kid, don't suppose you'd be thinking about selling it?"
trigger.send: say yes

trigger.match: You receive baby back ribs from the third little pig.
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You have the ribs to move on... ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: What song does the harp play?
trigger.send: say summon the hangman

trigger.match: Who sold the Emperor's diamond?
trigger.send: say King Tharibold the IV

trigger.match: What is the first ingredient of lip balm?
trigger.send: say Trioxeline Dioxide (extracted from halfling livers)

trigger.match: Who is Toto?
trigger.send: say your little guinea pig

trigger.match: What was the name of the king's daughter in Puss'N'Boots?
trigger.send: say Priscilla

trigger.match: What line of work did the giant want to go into?
trigger.send: say a executioner

trigger.match: Who does Little Red Riding Hood's mother remind you of?
trigger.send: say a particularly dyslexic chicken

trigger.match: What the hell is flax?
trigger.send: say it sounds like something to help when you're constipated, or a fantastic new weight loss solution

trigger.match: What kind of seeds does the golden apple have?
trigger.send: say emerald

trigger.match: Who is the Dowager Duchess of Clairbourne?
trigger.send: say janet

trigger.match: Where was the golden charm made?
trigger.send: say Kerofk Elf Sweat Shop #215

trigger.match: What size is the swan's brain?
trigger.send: say rivals the size of the pea

trigger.match: Who is Westron?
trigger.send: say high butler of clairbourne

trigger.match: What would you call a raging forest inferno?
trigger.send: say campfire gone wrong

trigger.match: What metal were the rings and bit of Greatheart's bridle made from?
trigger.send: say silver

trigger.match: What is your niece's name?
trigger.send: say courtney

trigger.match: What is the name of the princess in Two-Eye?
trigger.send: say princess gertrude

trigger.match: What is the name of the mermaid's prince's boyfriend?
trigger.send: say daniel

trigger.match: What is the name of the farmer?
trigger.send: say farmer cletus

trigger.match: What is the name of Two-Eyes?
trigger.send: say princess

trigger.match: What is the name of Sleeping Beauty's father?
trigger.send: say king cecil

trigger.match: What is the first thing the miller's wife wished for?
trigger.send: say a counter that magically cleaned itself

trigger.match: What is the evil faerie's occupation?
trigger.send: say tooth faerie

trigger.match: What in the hell is flax?
trigger.send: say it sounds like something to help when you're constipated, or a fantastic new weight loss solution

trigger.match: What group does Sleeping Beauty join?
trigger.send: say the League of Women Boaters

trigger.match: What does the tattoo on the third little pig say?
trigger.send: say bad to the bone

trigger.match: What does the sea hag wear around her neck?
trigger.send: say severed ears

trigger.match: What does the Tzar order his guards to do?
trigger.send: say tar and feather

trigger.match: What does jack call his mother?
trigger.send: say hag or shortsighted, overbearing, overdressed, manipulating witch!

trigger.match: What do the runes on the first side of the silver sword say?
trigger.send: say guido wuz hear

trigger.match: What did you do to a child in kerofk when you were 16?
trigger.send: say hunted him down and chopped off his arm

trigger.match: What did tom thumb do when he was five years old?
trigger.send: say kill robbers kill bandits defeat robbers defeat bandits

trigger.match: What did Alice do?
trigger.send: say Tripped in a rabbit hole and broke her foot

trigger.match: What country does queen lativia rule?
trigger.send: say Tisenbore

trigger.match: What color were the emperor's suede boots?
trigger.send: say emerald green

trigger.match: What color hair does Tzar Ivan have?
trigger.send: say bald

trigger.match: What color dress does the giant's wife wear?
trigger.send: say blue

trigger.match: What animal formed Beauty's cloak clasp?
trigger.send: say gryphon

trigger.match: How many eyes did Two-Eye's mother have?
trigger.send: say five

trigger.match: How many brothers did the swan-queen have?
trigger.send: say twelve brothers

trigger.match: What is the magic bean related to?
trigger.send: say the Mexican Jumping Bean

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get a royal pardon."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 17 ","white","","complete. ","yellow","","Task 18 ","white","","you NEED to be Neutral before starting") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the golden carrot award."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 18 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 19... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26817", "Click Here", "goes to room 26817", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the Emperor's not so invisible scepter."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 12 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 13... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26814", "Click Here", "runs to next task in room 26814", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") Send ("keep kiss")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to find a golden apple."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 13 ","white","","complete. To move on to ","yellow","","Task 14 ","white","","after the fight... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26787;keep scepter", "Click Here", "runs to next task in room 26787", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get a phoenix feather."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 20 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 21... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26780", "Click Here", "goes to room 26780", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get a bowl of savory pork stew."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 15 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 16... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26751", "Click Here", "Moves to Task 16", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get Sleeping Beauty's kiss."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 11 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 12... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26772", "Click Here", "Moves to Task 12", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to find the royal bracers."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 19 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 20... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26847", "Click Here", "goes to room 26847", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to bring that feather to the weasel."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 21 ","white","","complete. To go to the weasel for turn in... ") Hyperlink ("weasel", "Click Here", "uses the weasel alias", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the troll's charm."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 9 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 10... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26818", "Click Here", "goes to room 26818", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

trigger.match: A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the golden egg that Jack laid."
trigger.send: Note ("") ColourTell ("yellow","","Task 10 ","white","","complete. To move on to Task 11... ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto 26765", "Click Here", "goes to room 26765", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("")

alias.send: open stew put ham stew put chop stew put rib stew close stew
say little goat bleat, give me something good to eat

if ("%1") == ("on") then EnableTriggerGroup("ft2", true) EnableAliasGroup("ft2", true) ColourNote ("blue","red", "FT2 is enabled!") enabled=1
elseif ("%1") == ("off") then EnableTriggerGroup("ft2", false) EnableAliasGroup("ft2", false) ColourNote ("blue","red", "FT2 is disabled!") enabled=0 end

muclient.script:
function OnHelp () world.Note (world.GetPluginInfo (world.GetPluginID (), 3)) end
function OnPluginInstall () ColourNote ("blue","yellow","FT2 Plugin Installed! Type ft2 help - to show help Plugin is Disabled by default.") EnableTriggerGroup("ft2",false) EnableAliasGroup("ft2",false) enabled=0 end
require "gmcphelper"
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if (enabled ~= nil and enabled == 0) then return end if (id == "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264") then -- Check if this broadcast is by gmcp handler if (text == "room.info") then -- Get MyID and send note when in specific room MyID = tonumber(gmcp("room.info.num")) if MyID == 26762 then Note ("") ColourNote ("yellow","","Task 9","white",""," : Bring the wolf's teeth back to the weasel.") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Kill Red Riding Hood for the hood to start task : ") Hyperlink ("k hood", "Click to k hood", "kill hood", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Wear the hood and move on ") Hyperlink ("wear hood;run wswn", "Click Here", "wear the hood and run to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Must be female...check ft2 help for rutabaga location...Hood is random drop") ColourNote ("blue","red","Check ft2 help..You will need hat, dirk, wish, chocolate cake, and rutabaga to start") Note ("") elseif MyID == 23751 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To buy rutabaga for sex change... you will need several... ") Hyperlink ("buy 4", "Click Here", "sends buy 4", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Sex change rutabaga is 4. Links for areas are in ft2 guide. Toggle it on/off with ft2 guide on/off") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26758 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Type hood for alias after you get basket or ") Hyperlink ("wear hood;run se", "Click Here", "wears the hood and runs se to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If no basket go South North til you get it") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26760 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","With ONLY 1 wolf left... ") Hyperlink ("give map wolf", "Click Here", "give map wolf", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move on to next part... ") Hyperlink ("wear boots;wear hood;run n", "Click Here", "wears eq and moves to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill all but 1 wolf..Giving map triggers next part") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26761 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","You can click to say the phrase and get the items ") Hyperlink ("eyes", "Click Here", "says phrase wears eq and moves to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Wear the two items and move on to next part... ") Hyperlink ("wear nose;wear wolf;run es", "Click Here", "wear the two items and move to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","or type eyes for the alias") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26763 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To say the phrase and trigger the fight... ") Hyperlink ("teeth", "Click Here", "says the phrase and starts fight", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","After getting the teeth to move on to the next task ") Hyperlink ("charm", "Click Here", "Moves on to the next task", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type teeth for alias for the phrase and to trigger fight") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type charm for alias to go next task") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26818 then Note ("") ColourNote ("yellow","","Task 10 ","white","",": Bring the troll's charm back to the weasel.") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To kill the Gruff ") Hyperlink ("k gruff", "Click Here", "sends k gruff", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Move north to get item from troll ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put your boots, helm, and mask back on..Kill Gruff then north..The Gruff's you kill have to be dead for you to get items from trolls north of them..If area repops while doing this make sure previous Gruff's are dead to get items from the next one etc.") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26819 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Once you have the chunk of goat meat go north or ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If you get the chunk of goat meat go North..If not go South North til you do") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26820 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To kill the Gruff ") Hyperlink ("k gruff", "Click Here", "sends k gruff", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Move north to get item from troll ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill Gruff again then North") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26821 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Once you have the goat skin go north or ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If you get goat skin go North..If not go South North til you do") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26822 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To kill the Gruff ") Hyperlink ("k gruff", "Click Here", "sends k gruff", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To move north to get item from troll and complete task ") Hyperlink ("run n", "Click Here", "runs north", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill Gruff then North") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26823 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","After you get the gold charm to move on to the next task ") Hyperlink ("golden egg", "Click Here", "Moves to the next task", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","All Gruff's have to be dead for troll to trigger..Go South then North if doesn't trigger") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type golden egg for alias to next task") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26765 then Note ("") ColourNote ("yellow","","Task 11 ","white","",": Bring the golden egg back to the weasel.") Note ("") ColourNote ("white","","Once the cow follows you go south then repeat North then South if the salesman doesn't trigger.") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To pat the cow go south... ") Hyperlink ("pat cow;run s", "Click Here", "pats the cow to get it to follow", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Pat cow then go South... May have to go North then South to trigger salesman") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26766 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Type beans for alias after you get a pile of beans or ") Hyperlink ("beans", "Click Here", "Uses beans alias to go to next part", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type beans for alias") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26769 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To get the harp and move west ") Hyperlink ("get harp;run west", "Click Here", "gets the harp and runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Get harp then go West") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26770 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To go west... ") Hyperlink ("run w", "Click Here", "runs west", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Go west") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26771 then Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To give the goose to Jack... ") Hyperlink ("give goose jack", "Click Here", "gives goose to Jack", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give goose jack..Keep trying he disappears and reappears if you are not fast enough") Note ("") elseif MyID == 26772 then Note ("") ColourNote ("yellow","","Task 12 ","white","",": Bring Sleeping Beauty's kiss back to the weasel.") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","To kill the faerie... ") Hyperlink ("k faerie", "Click Here", "sends k faerie", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Once you have the thorn and u have the envenom skill... ") Hyperlink ("envenom thorn", "Click Here", "envenoms the thorn", "red", "", 0) Note ("") Note ("") ColourTell ("white","","Once envenom is done... ----Miniwindow for FT2 Guide----
require "themed_miniwindows"
local my_window = ThemedTextWindow("testft2guidewindow", 200, 200, 200, 200, "FT2_Guide", "center", false, true, true, false, false, false, false, Dina, 10, Dina, 10, 1000, 5, true, false)
-- Add contents of window
my_window:add_text("@CGet these items for each run @W:\n") my_window:add_text( "@W1 Chocolate per run : @RClick Here", true, { {label="buy chocolate", start=23, stop=32, text="a='mapper goto 1258;buy chocolate';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@W1 Dirk per run : @RClick Here", true, { {label="buy dirk", start=18, stop=27, text="a='mapper goto 32598;buy dirk';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@W1 hat per run : @RClick Here", true, { {label="buy hat", start=17, stop=26, text="a='mapper goto 49335;buy hat';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@W1 Heart only keeps giving back : @RClick Here", true, { {label="buy heart", start=34, stop=43, text="a='mapper goto 30531;buy heart';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@W1 wish per run : @RClick Here", true, { {label="kill silverfish for wish", start=18, stop=27, text="a='mapper goto 1246';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@W1 lute per run : @RClick Here", true, { {label="kill musician for lute or major create it", start=18, stop=27, text="a='mapper goto 30823';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@WRutabaga for sex change : @RClick Here", true, { {label="will need several each time", start=27, stop=36, text="a='mapper goto 23751';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@WFix your align : @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to area to fix alignment", start=18, stop=27, text="a='mapper goto 34401';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text("\n@W-@YTask List@W-\n") my_window:add_text( "@YTask 9 @W: Bring the wolf's teeth back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26762", start=53, stop=62, text="a='mapper goto 26762';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 10 @W: Bring the troll's charm back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26818", start=54, stop=63, text="a='mapper goto 26818';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 11 @W: Bring the golden egg back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26765", start=52, stop=61, text="a='mapper goto 26765';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 12 @W: Bring sleeping beauty's kiss back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26772", start=60, stop=69, text="a='mapper goto 26772';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 13 @W: Bring the emperor's not so invisible scepter back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26814", start=76, stop=85, text="a='mapper goto 26814';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 14 @W: Bring the golden apple back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26787", start=54, stop=63, text="a='mapper goto 26787';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 15 @W: Bring Tom Thumb's tiny hat back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26793", start=58, stop=67, text="a='mapper goto 26793';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 16 @W: Bring a bowl of savory pork stew back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26751", start=64, stop=73, text="a='mapper goto 26751';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 17 @W: Bring a pair of swan wings back to the weasel. @RClick Here", true, { {label="goes to room 26807", start=58, stop=67, text="a='mapper goto 26807';Execute(a)"}, } ) my_window:add_text( "@YTask 18 @W: Bring your royal pardon back to the -- Hide the FT2 Guide window function hideFT2_Guide() my_window:hide() end
-- Show the FT2 Guide window function showFT2_Guide() my_window:show() end
----------------------- Plugin Update Code ----------------------- -- Code taken from Durel's dinv plugin, originally via Crowley require("wait") require("async") json = require("json")
plugin_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Khrysis-aard/plugins/refs/heads/main/FT2_portal.xml" SetVariable("DownloadURL", plugin_url) plugin_protocol = "HTTPS" plugin_prefix = "[FT2_portal]"
function update_check_alias() update_plugin("check") ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," Checking for updated version...") end
function update_install_alias() update_plugin("install") ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," Checking for and installing updated version...") end
function reload_plugin() local scriptPrefix = GetAlphaOption("script_prefix") local retval
-- If the user has not already specified the script prefix for this version of mush, pick a -- reasonable default value if (scriptPrefix == "") then scriptPrefix = "\\\\\\" SetAlphaOption("script_prefix", scriptPrefix) end
-- Tell mush to reload the plugin in one second. We can't do it directly here because a -- plugin can't unload itself. Even if it could, how could it tell mush to load it again -- if it weren't installed? retval = Execute(scriptPrefix.."DoAfterSpecial(0.1, \"ReloadPlugin('"..GetPluginID().."')\", sendto.script)") end
function update_plugin(mode) update_mode = mode
wait.make(get_plugin_file) end
function get_plugin_file() local urlThread = async.request(plugin_url, plugin_protocol)
if not urlThread then note_error("Couldn't create async url request.") return end
local timeout = 10 local totTime = 0 while (urlThread:alive() and totTime < timeout) do wait.time(0.1) totTime = totTime + 0.1 end
local remoteRet, pluginData, status, headers, fullStatus = urlThread:join()
if not status then ColourNote("red", "", plugin_prefix .. " Couldn't download plugin file. No status code.")
return end
if (status ~= 200) then ColourNote("red", "", plugin_prefix .. " Plugin file request status code: " .. status .. ": " .. fullStatus) return end
local currentVersion = GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 19) or 0 local currentVerStr = string.format("%1.3f", currentVersion) local remoteVerStr = string.match(pluginData, '%s%s+version="([0-9%.]+)"') local remoteVersion = tonumber(remoteVerStr or "") or 0
if remoteVersion == currentVersion then ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," You are running the most recent version. (","cyan","","v" .. currentVerStr .. "","white","",")") elseif (remoteVersion < currentVersion) then ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," You have a newer version than is publicly available. (","cyan","","v" .. currentVerStr .. "","white","",")") elseif (update_mode == "check") then ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," You are running ","cyan","","v" .. currentVerStr .. "","white",""," , but there's a newer version ","cyan","","v" .. remoteVerStr) elseif (update_mode == "install") then ColourNote("yellow", "", plugin_prefix .. "","white",""," Updating plugin from version ","cyan","", currentVerStr .. "","white",""," to version ","cyan","", remoteVerStr .."")
local pluginFile = GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 6) local file = io.open(pluginFile, "wb") file:write(pluginData) file:close() reload_plugin() else ColourNote("red", "", plugin_prefix .. " Invalid update mode: " .. update_mode) end end ----------------------- End Plugin Update Code -----------------------
